name: Far Land Provisions
notes: American, Cafe, Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options
Massachusetts favorite corner store & deli featuring on-site bakery, prepared foods, and made to order breakfast and lunch sandwiches
Providing full-service catering for weddings, special events, and cocktail parties.
